Description: Inlay of fruit shape: in opaque, turquoise-blue glass in the shape of a fruit of the persea tree. The obverse is barely convex, glossy surface. The reverse is matt. Apparently cut to shape from a moulded piece. Probably from an inlaid necklace.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Deir el-Bahri (Thebes), from the area of the Eleventh Dynasty Temple
